DOC.HEADLINE: 1st Ld: Two dead, over 10 injured in tax office explosion in central China

TEXT.P: Two people were killed and more than 10 were injured Friday afternoon in an explosion at a taxation office building in Changsha City, capital of central China's Hunan Province.
The explosion occurred at about 5 p.m. near a downtown residential block in Changsha's Furong District, according to a statement from the district government.
